div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1706 Saqqara, near Memphis, 20 km. S of Cairo, 1967 Burial: c. 150 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 67 AE. From excavations near entrance to Ibis galleries (cf. JEA 1967, p. 142) Ptolemy VI (incl. types of Svoronos 1375, 1423-4, 1491-5) Disposition: London Information from G. K. Jenkins
